level.heading: Job growth tax credit.
level.text: For tax years beginning on or after January 1, 2010, but prior to January 1, 2015, upon application by a taxpayer, in the order of priority received and not to exceed the annual amount allocated therefor in the budget and financial plan, the Mayor, in accordance with this subchapter, shall approve, and there may be allowed, to any taxpayer an annual job growth tax credit with respect to the franchise taxes imposed by subchapters VII and VIII of this chapter, for a credit period in an amount determined by the Mayor pursuant to § 47-1807.54.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 47-1807.53 and § 47-1807.54.
